TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameScopeDictionary implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>>, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Windows.Markup.INameScope
Public Interface INameScopeDictionary Implements ICollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object)), IDictionary(Of String, Object), IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object)), INameScope

public interface class INameScopeDictionary : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>, System::Windows::Markup::INameScope

type INameScopeDictionary = interface interface INameScope interface IDictionary<string, obj> interface ICollection<KeyValuePair<string, obj>> interface seq<KeyValuePair<string, obj>> interface IEnumerable

Docs.summary: 将可枚举的集合和字典支持进行了统一，可用于公开 XAML 名称范围中名称的字典。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScopeDictionary>不定义自己的成员。 相反, 接口会继承<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>和泛型接口, 并将<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.Object> (或其中<xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair%602>的) 作为约束。 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScopeDictionary>还继承<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。
<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScopeDictionary>接口在内部用作信息传递类型, 作为 WPF XAML 实现的对象编写器上下文的一部分。
